願.definition: (bound form) wish; hope; desire; to be willing; to wish (that sth may happen); may ...; vow; pledge

願心.definition: a wish; a request (to a deity)

願意.definition: to wish; to want; ready; willing (to do sth)

願聞其詳.definition: I'd like to hear the details

願賭服輸.definition: lit. if you agree to bet you must accept to lose; fig. you bet, you pay
